 2000-03582000-03-230INT'L TRADE,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of an AMENDMENT (No. 6) to the original FOOTHILLS SHAREHOLDERS AGREEMENT dated August 4, 1977, which takes into account the amalgamation of Alberta Natural Gas Company Ltd. with TransCanada Pipelines Limited AND the subsequent amalgamation of NOVA Gas International Ltd. with TransCanada PipeLines.
